description:
Learning all your basic 7 chords on the acoustic guitar. A roadmap through the beginner phase of the acoustic guitar.

Very detailed walk through showing you step by step how to play the basic chords on the acoustic guitar

When you are completed with this course you will know how to play all your basic chords on the acoustic guitar

Have a basic skills on how to clean and restring your guitar

You will also learn the names of your strings to help you get through this course with ease.

At the end of this lesson you will be able to play most songs you hear on the radio and internet.

If you are a want to be singer songwriter this is for you.
title: Beginners guide to the Acoustic Guitar
